title: The Huge Risk and Historic Reward of Vingegaard Racing the Tour de France: ‘We’ve Abandoned the Ideal Trajectory’
content:
Nobody knows what version of Vingegaard will show up to the Tour, but Visma-Lease a Bike has no option but to take him: 'We're going with a different mindset.'

Read the full article at The Huge Risk and Historic Reward of Vingegaard Racing the Tour de France: ‘We’ve Abandoned the Ideal Trajectory’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
